subsections.title: Senior Software Engineer
subsections.subtitle: Plain Concepts
subsections.text: As a senior .NET Software Engineer at Plain Concept, I gained experience delivering innovative solutions to clients using a variety of technologies, including .NET, C#, Azure, React, SQL, CosmosDB and other technologies. I was part of a team that partnered with Microsoft to provide innovative solutions and drive digital transformation for our clients.

subsections.title: Techincal co-founder
subsections.subtitle: Srcrr & IUser
subsections.text: Working on the start-up of various projects in the legal sector of Belgium. We use new technologies such as Blazor and .NET Core 5 and put special emphasis on learning or using other technologies or concepts like Functional programming, NodeJS, Angular and Typescript.

subsections.title: Full Stack .NET Developer & Lead Software Engineer
subsections.subtitle: Caldr
subsections.text: Caldr is a startup that makes it possible to efficiently and dynamically schedule appointments with care providers, and also facilitates communication between care providers and patients. I started as a Full stack developer but taken over this project from my predecessor as a Lead developer. The latest technologies were used, mainly in the Microsoft Stack: .NET Core, SignalR, MSSQL, VueJS, SASS.

subsections.title: Full Stack .NET Developer
subsections.subtitle: Casius
subsections.text: For Casius I contributed in the development of new projects, but I also maintained and updated legacy projects. The technology stack was very broad but the following new technologies were often used: .NET Core 2.1, Entity Framework Core, NUnit, VueJS, SASS, Hangfire, Scrum. The legacy stack existed mainly out of: ASP .NET MVC, Razer, MSSQL & Micro ORM’s

subsections.title: Full Stack .NET Developer
subsections.subtitle: HumanICT
subsections.text: I collaborated on internal projects related to pricing and invoicing of medical performances for health insurances, using Belgian government services. The technologies that were mainly used: ASP .NET MVC, Razer, MSSQL, CSS3, SOAP, WCF.

subsections.title: Internship
subsections.subtitle: The Liverpool Office Ltd
subsections.text: Creating a mobile game in Unity3D.

subsections.title: Bachelors Degree in Multimedia- and Communication Technology
subsections.subtitle: Howest Hogeschool West-Vlaanderen
subsections.text: Professional bachelor: Multimedia- and communication technology. Some modules include: .NET programming solutions, Information and system security, Backend web development, frontend web development, Data communication, Mobile APP development, Server Side Advanced, Business applications, Object oriented Programming.

subsections.title: TSO 3rd grade Industrial Information and Communication Technology
subsections.subtitle: V.T.I. Sint-Laurentius
subsections.text: Some subjects include: Electronics, High level programming (C#, C++), Low level programming (Assembler), Electricity.

subsections.title: Technical
items: Proficient as a full-stack software developer. Including technologies, methodologies and concepts.
Proficient in backend technologies including ASP.NET, ASP.NET Core and C#.
Proficient in frontend technologies including HTML5, CSS3 (SCSS), Blazor and JavaScript (Pure, Jquery, VueJS, Angular, Typescript).
Proficient in Databases and other data storages. (MySQL, MSSQL, Azure storage)
Familiar in NodeJS Backend technologies including NestJS.
Familiar in web frameworks, architectures and libraries like Knockout, Gulp and Webpack
Basic knowledge of developing for android. (Java, Xamarin)
Basic knowledge of low-level programming. (PIC controllers, Assembler)
I love to develop new projects from scratch, preferably with the latest technologies. Learning new concepts and skills.
I also have a passion for working with hardware like 3D Printers.
I’m eager to work on personal projects and to learn new skills, concepts and other technical aspects.
I enjoy travelling, hiking and am always open to work abroad.

subsections.text: Please contact me for reference contact details.
